risks.risk: Agent invents steps not requested by user
risks.mitigation: 04_NEVER.md prohibits inferring steps; validation script can flag suspiciously many steps

risks.risk: Plan file corruption from concurrent access
risks.mitigation: Single-agent design; scripts use atomic write patterns

risks.risk: Stale plan state after session resumption
risks.mitigation: STATE.json provides full history; status.sh shows current state
